description:
Parses the string representation of a JSON dictionary to a dictionary.
If the parsing is unsuccessful, the input is forwarded via `bounced`.

Example A:
1. "{\"first\":1,\"third\":3,\"fifth\":5}"@0 received via `json`
2. `parsed` sends { "first": 1, "third": 3, "fifth": 5 }@0

Example B:
1. "malformed"@0 received via `json`
2. `bounced` sends "malformed"@0

612de880-6653-4097-b917-aabc4f6aceb2.name: json
612de880-6653-4097-b917-aabc4f6aceb2.description:
Receives the JSON string to parse.

Example:
"{\"first\":1,\"third\":3,\"fifth\":5}"

426110b5-257a-45c2-976c-f42195dafde8.name: bounced
426110b5-257a-45c2-976c-f42195dafde8.description: Sends the value of `json`, if the parsing was unsuccessful.

a42a0dbc-5235-416c-9166-9999d79c06f6.name: error

name: data/dictionary/JSON parser
